alert.note: Alert for Polk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 17 at 8:31PM CDT until September 18 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL POLK COUNTY... At 831 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Weh-Weh-Neh-Kee State Park, or near Altoona, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Des Moines, Ankeny, Altoona, Bondurant, Saylorville, Mitchellville, Adventureland Amusement Park, Prairie Meadows, Margo Frankel Woods State Park, Ankeny Regional Airport and Weh-Weh-Neh-Kee State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 87 and 93. Interstate 80 between mile markers 135 and 149. Interstate 235 near mile marker 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
